org.opendaylight.controller.protocol_plugin.openflow.core

Interface IController

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Controller

    public interface IController
    This interface defines an abstraction of the Open Flow Controller that allows applications to control and manage the Open Flow switches.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addMessageListener(org.openflow.protocol.OFType type, IMessageListener listener)
      Allows application to start receiving OF messages received from switches.
      void addSwitchStateListener(ISwitchStateListener listener)
      Allows application to start receiving switch state change events.
      ISwitch getSwitch(java.lang.Long switchId)
      Returns the ISwitch of the given switchId.
      java.util.Map<java.lang.Long,ISwitch> getSwitches()
      Returns a map containing all the OF switches that are currently connected to the Controller.
      void removeMessageListener(org.openflow.protocol.OFType type, IMessageListener listener)
      Allows application to stop receiving OF message received from switches.
      void removeSwitchStateListener(ISwitchStateListener listener)
      Allows application to stop receiving switch state change events.

    • Method Detail

      • addMessageListener

        void addMessageListener(org.openflow.protocol.OFType type,
                      IMessageListener listener)
        Allows application to start receiving OF messages received from switches.
        Parameters:
        type - the type of OF message that applications want to receive
        listener: - Object that implements the IMessageListener

      • removeMessageListener

        void removeMessageListener(org.openflow.protocol.OFType type,
                         IMessageListener listener)
        Allows application to stop receiving OF message received from switches.
        Parameters:
        type - The type of OF message that applications want to stop receiving
        listener - The object that implements the IMessageListener

      • addSwitchStateListener

        void addSwitchStateListener(ISwitchStateListener listener)
        Allows application to start receiving switch state change events.
        Parameters:
        listener - The object that implements the ISwitchStateListener

      • removeSwitchStateListener

        void removeSwitchStateListener(ISwitchStateListener listener)
        Allows application to stop receiving switch state change events.
        Parameters:
        listener - The object that implements the ISwitchStateListener

      • getSwitches

        java.util.Map<java.lang.Long,ISwitch> getSwitches()
        Returns a map containing all the OF switches that are currently connected to the Controller.
        Returns:
        Map of ISwitch

      • getSwitch

        ISwitch getSwitch(java.lang.Long switchId)
        Returns the ISwitch of the given switchId.
        Parameters:
        switchId - The switch ID
        Returns:
        ISwitch if present, null otherwise
